document.title: Beta-Reduction
Beta-Reduction

section.title: RP 16 Part 1
section.paragraph: This randomized problem will help you identify beta-redexes. To earn credit for it, you will have to solve it correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 16 Part 2
section.paragraph: This randomized problem will help you identify beta-redexes and prepare to reduce them by determining whether an alpha-conversion is needed. To earn credit for it, you will have to solve it correctly three times in a row.

section.title: RP 16 Part 3
section.paragraph: This randomized problem will make you practice performing beta-reductions. To earn credit for it, you will have to solve it correctly three times in a row.
